column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////The friends I went with ordered the roast eggplant salad with goat cheese
column2: and the roast dates with bacon & apple vinaigrette. They said that their order wasn't all that either
column3: not as bad as my tuna
column4: but not all that good either
column5: so it's not just me....for all you lot thinking I'm just crapping on this place! ;p
